high_descs: Move to the right of the toilet.
Pick up the candle from the toilet.
Turn towards the counter next to the tub.
Put the candle on the counter next to the tub.
anns.task_desc: Put the candle on the counter next to the tub.

high_descs: Walk forward and left toward the right side of the toilet
Pick up the candle from on top of the toilet
Move to face toward the surface right of the bathtub
Put the candle down on the edge of the surface just right of the bath tub
anns.task_desc: Put the candle down next to the bathtub

high_descs: Go forward toward the shower, turn left then right and face the toilet on your left.
Take the candle from the toilet tank.
Turn left then face the tub on your right.
Place the candle on the tub.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle from the toilet tank to the tub.
